metadata.name: Classic
metadata.description: A classic theme for rendering API documentation in Markdown format.
metadata.author: Kambiz Khojasteh

pageHeader.description: The markdown content for the page header. Template functions and variables can be used here.

pageFooter.description: The markdown content for the page footer. Template functions and variables can be used here.

seeAlsoSubtopics.description: Whether to automatically include related subtopics as 'see also' references.
